title: Solidarity
name: Solidarity
description: Over 100 students hold a solidarity rally outside the Main Building with the 18 students are locked inside, negotiating with administration. Media and police liasons control messaging and monitor the crowd for changes in mood and energy. The students are energized by the activity and maintain enthusiasm for several hours. They are hopeful.
